claims.claim: The global AI agent market is valued at $7.38-7.92 billion in 2025
claims.verification_notes: Multiple market research sources confirm similar figures

claims.claim: AI agent market projected to reach $103.6 billion by 2032
claims.verification_notes: Single source projection, CAGR calculations appear reasonable

claims.claim: 85% of organizations have integrated AI agents in at least one workflow
Organizations project average ROI of 171% from agentic AI deployments
claims.verification_notes: Projected ROI, not realized - interpret with caution

claims.claim: MCP was donated to Agentic AI Foundation under Linux Foundation in December 2025
AgentCore SDK downloaded over 2 million times in 5 months since preview
80% of organizations have encountered risky behaviors from AI agents
41% of organizations report security/reliability concerns with IAM for agents
OpenAI launched AgentKit at Dev Day on October 6, 2025
Claude Agent SDK published on September 29, 2025
Dify has ~93,000 GitHub stars, making it the most starred AI agent platform
claims.verification_notes: GitHub star counts are publicly verifiable

claims.claim: CrewAI has over 30,000 GitHub stars with nearly 1 million monthly downloads
claims.verification_notes: GitHub and npm/pip download stats are verifiable

claims.claim: LangGraph has over 14,000 stars and 4.2 million monthly downloads
OpenAI Agents SDK has over 11,000 GitHub stars since March 2025 release
Enterprise AI agent implementations range from $100,000-$2,000,000 depending on scope
claims.verification_notes: Consistent with multiple enterprise software implementation benchmarks

claims.claim: AI agent costs have decreased to under $0.50 per interaction vs $4-8 for human agents
claims.verification_notes: Depends on use case complexity and implementation quality

claims.claim: Salesforce charges $2 per conversation for AI agents
claims.verification_notes: Public pricing information from Salesforce Agentforce

claims.claim: Microsoft charges $4 per hour for Copilot AI agents
Gartner predicts by 2028, 33% of enterprise software will incorporate agentic AI
92% of developers now use AI tools, with 30% productivity boost reported
Amazon Bedrock AgentCore reached general availability in late 2025
OpenAI adopted MCP in March 2025, Google confirmed support in April 2025
